baby_creeper_gold.label: Golden Creeper
baby_creeper_gold.description: You unlocked this companion by joining Iskall85's Gemstone event streams and collecting 50 gemstones with your companion.

baby_creeper_pog.label: POG Creeper
baby_creeper_pog.description: You unlocked this companion by being present for Iskall85's Gemstone event and placing within the top 123 players.

golden_kappa.label: Golden Kappa
golden_kappa.description: You obtained this shield by having an awake companion during a Golden Kappa Hype Train on Twitch.

dylan_vip.label: Dylan VIP
dylan_vip.description: You obtained this set when Iskall85 personally gifted it to you live on Twitch.

companion_leader_s1.label: Companion Leader S1
companion_leader_s1.description: You earned this set by getting your companion to level 12 during an Iskall85 stream.

i85_royale_crown.label: Royale Crown
i85_royale_crown.description: You unlocked this crown by being present when Iskall completed the very first Vault Royale.

i85_spring_set.label: Spring Set
i85_spring_set.description: You secured this set by tuning into Iskall85's special Twitch event on 18 June 2025.

i85_treasure_train.label: Treasure Train
i85_treasure_train.description: You picked this up by having an awake companion during a Treasure Hype Train on Twitch.

i85_server_bingos.label: Bingo Chestplate
i85_server_bingos.description: You claimed this prize by winning a Bingo Bust event on the official Vault Hunters servers.

iskall85_falcon_helmet.label: Falcon Helmet
iskall85_falcon_helmet.description: You unlocked this armor piece by participating in Iskall85's Horde Rush event.

iskall85_falcon_chestplate.label: Falcon Chestplate
iskall85_falcon_chestplate.description: You unlocked this armor piece by participating in Iskall85's Horde Rush event.

iskall85_falcon_set.label: Falcon Set
iskall85_falcon_set.description: You have both the Falcon Helmet and Chestplate from Iskall85's Horde Rush event.

iskall85_reddragon_axe.label: Red Dragon Axe
iskall85_reddragon_axe.description: You claimed this weapon by joining Iskall85's Horde Rush community event.

iskall85_reddragon_sword.label: Red Dragon Sword
iskall85_reddragon_sword.description: You claimed this weapon by joining Iskall85's Horde Rush community event.

iskall85_ancient_scroll.label: Ancient Scroll
iskall85_ancient_scroll.description: You uncovered this scroll as part of Iskall85's Horde Rush event rewards.

i85_companion_dino.label: Dino Companion
i85_companion_dino.description: You earned this companion by participating in Iskall85's Horde Rush event.

i85_dylan_penguin.label: Dylan Penguin
i85_dylan_penguin.description: You received this companion by participating in Iskall85's Horde Rush event.

i85_mattress.label: Mattress
i85_mattress.description: You obtained this reward during Iskall85's Horde Rush event.

i85_petal_splitter.label: Petal Splitter
i85_petal_splitter.description: You picked up this dual blade by taking part in Iskall85's Horde Rush event.

i85_twin_blade.label: Twin Blade
i85_twin_blade.description: You secured this weapon through Iskall85's Horde Rush event.

halloween_pumpkin.label: Bumbo Pumpkini
halloween_pumpkin.description: Dropped during the Halloween Twitch event with Iskall85.

pink_dylan.label: Pink Dylan
pink_dylan.description: You got this by getting level 5 in the second season.

forsaken_axe.label: Forsaken Axe
forsaken_axe.description: You got this by getting level 7 in the second season.

forsaken_sword.label: Forsaken Sword
forsaken_sword.description: You got this by getting level 7 in the second season.

bumbo_cactoni.label: Bumbo Cactoni
bumbo_cactoni.description: You got this by getting level 10 in the second season.

carrot.label: Carrot
carrot.description: You got this by getting level 15 in the second season.

golden_bumbo_cactoni.label: Golden Bumbo Cactoni
golden_bumbo_cactoni.description: You got this by getting level 25 in the second season.

essence_of_iskallium.label: Essence of Iskallium
essence_of_iskallium.description: You obtained this reward by reaching Ethernal level 60.

hypefuse_scepter.label: Hypefuse Scepter
hypefuse_scepter.description: You obtained this reward by reaching Ethernal level 60.

never_ever.label: Never Ever
never_ever.description: You obtained this shield by reaching Ethernal level 60.

sculk_set.label: Sculk Set
sculk_set.description: You obtained this set by reaching Ethernal level 80.

green_christmas_hat.label: Green Christmas Hat
green_christmas_hat.description: A festive hat awarded during the first Iskall85's holiday stream event.

i85_100stream.label: 100 Streams Blade
i85_100stream.description: This reward celebrates Iskall85's 100th stream since his return.

i85_xmas_day3.label: Santa Claus Dylan & Christmas Sword
i85_xmas_day3.description: This reward is from the third day of the Dylan Christmas event!

xmas_dayfour_chest.label: Gingerbread Chestplate
xmas_dayfour_chest.description: This reward is from the fourth day of the Dylan Christmas event!

gingerbread_man.label: Gingerbread Man
